AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Guatemala: country of origin of Juventino Mejia-Orosco and his passengers, citizenship of Juventino Mejia-Orosco
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Mexico: route of transportation, country through which Juventino Mejia-Orosco transported aliens, country of origin for 574,000 Mexican pesos found in Juventino Mejia-Orosco's van
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: destination of illegal transportation, country where Juventino Mejia-Orosco was convicted, country where Hector Galvencio Paz-Ortega and Carlos Enrique Cruz-Morales illegally entered
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo, Texas: City where Juventino Mejia-Orosco drove his van across the bridge, city where the group spent two days
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Rio Grande: River waded by Hector Galvencio Paz-Ortega and Carlos Enrique Cruz-Morales, border crossing point
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo: City where the group spent two days
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Los Angeles: City where Hector Galvencio Paz-Ortega's family lived, source of $1,000 funds for Juventino Mejia-Orosco
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.New York City: City where relatives of Carlos Enrique Cruz-Morales lived, destination of Carlos Enrique Cruz-Morales' flight
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo International Airport: Airport where Juventino Mejia-Orosco supplied airline tickets to San Antonio
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Antonio: City where Juventino Mejia-Orosco drove Hector Galvencio Paz-Ortega and Carlos Enrique Cruz-Morales, destination of airline tickets provided by Juventino Mejia-Orosco
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Antonio International Airport: Airport where Hector Galvencio Paz-Ortega was detained
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.district court: court that makes factual findings and applies sentencing guidelines, responsible for clarifying ultimate factual findings
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Supreme Court: Highest court in the United States, responsible for interpreting laws and making factual determinations in certain cases, including recognizing findings that require assessment of complex evidence and sensitivity to legal purposes as factual
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Western District of Louisiana: district where the judge is from, district where Judge CLARK is assigned
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.CLARK: District Judge of the Western District of Louisiana
